content.prompt: The form of the animal is represented using which of the following techniques?

choices.label: Composite pose to show the figure from multiple angles
Profile so that distinctive aspects of the animal are clearly recognizable
Foreshortening to create the illusion that the animal is in motion
Overlapping extremities that convey a sense of spatial depth

topic.text: 1.2: Materials, Processes, and Techniques in Prehistoric Art

skill.text: Skill 1.C: Explain how artistic decisions about form, style, materials, technique, and/or content shape a work of art (or group of related works of art).
